metadata.title: CVE-2020-25813 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In MediaWiki before 1.31.10 and 1.32.x through 1.34.x before 1.34.4,Special:UserRights exposes the existence of hidden users.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
